content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello, Maria Mamani. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment. Let's discuss the price that you are willing to pay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. What's the lowest price you can offer for this apartment?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: As a landlord, I aim to provide a comfortable living space while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. The lowest price I can offer for this 25 square meter apartment is 750 Euro per month. This includes all utilities except for electricity, which would be an additional cost. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: 750 Euro per month seems a bit high for me, given the size of the apartment. I'm looking for something more in the range of 600 to 650 Euro per month. Would you be able to lower the price?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: I appreciate your feedback on the price, Maria. While I cannot go as low as 600 Euros per month, I'm willing to negotiate a bit. How about 700 Euro per month, including all utilities except for electricity? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
